caller_intent: James Marshall wants to update his Progressive umbrella insurance policy to remove his daughter from the policy after she moved to Ohio and married, and confirm how his auto/home insurance renewals will proceed.
resolution_steps: Agent verified James's address and confirmed policy details (vehicles, daughter's Jeep).
Agent updated the umbrella policy to remove the daughter.
Agent checked auto insurance status (auto-renewing via auto pay).
Agent confirmed home insurance is escrowed through Wells Fargo and will be paid off in November 2026.
Agent informed James the umbrella policy update would take a few days and result in a revised bill.
knowledge_required: Escrow account management for home insurance
summary: James Marshall updated his Progressive umbrella policy to remove his daughter after her move to Ohio. The agent confirmed auto/home insurance details, noting auto would renew automatically and home insurance would transition to direct billing after mortgage payoff. The umbrella policy update will be processed with a revised bill.
